author: amyroh
msg: Japanese message updates for Tomcat 5 which resolve the problem
where you can't deploy tomcat by ant in Japanese environment.

author: yoavs
msg: Removed Tomcat 5.0.x entries from 5.5.x changelog, added link to 5.0.x changelog and explanatory text.  This way we don't have to enter every back-ported bug fix in two changelogs.  Added initial 5.5.0 changelog entries in vague/ballpark terms.

author: yoavs
msg: Added a hint on replacing the default Xalan
